message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it offers a lot of value and I'm sure you'll be happy with it.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $150 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $100 at this time.
I understand your position, Bob, but $150 is already a very competitive price for this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $135?
Alice, $135 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $115.  Let's try to reach an agreement that works for both of us.
